name: BARNWELL COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist Barnwell County Sheriffs Office with establishing an Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners for U.S. Marshals Service at the Barnwell County jail.
